pizzerias.name: Mąka i Woda
pizzerias.specialty: Pizza Hawaii (sos pomidorowy, mozzarella fior di latte, szynka, ananas, bazylia)
pizzerias.description: Authentic Neapolitan pizzeria with a certified wood-fired oven from Naples. Despite their traditional focus, they offer a Hawaiian pizza made with high-quality ingredients and imported Italian mozzarella.

pizzerias.name: Pizzaiola
pizzerias.specialty: Hawajska Premium (sos pomidorowy, mozzarella, włoska szynka gotowana, świeży ananas, oregano)
pizzerias.description: Upscale pizzeria serving Roman-style pizzas with crispy, airy crusts. Their Hawaiian pizza uses fresh rather than canned pineapple and imported Italian cooked ham.

pizzerias.name: Pizzeria Mamma Mia
pizzerias.specialty: Tropicana (sos pomidorowy, ser mozzarella, szynka, ananas, kukurydza)
pizzerias.description: Family-friendly pizzeria serving classic Polish-style pizzas. Their Hawaiian variation includes corn as an additional topping, a popular addition in Eastern European pizzas.

pizzerias.name: Pizzeria Tradycyjna
pizzerias.specialty: Pizza Hawajska z Miodem (sos pomidorowy, mozzarella, szynka, ananas, miód)
pizzerias.description: Traditional Polish pizzeria in the historic Royal Route area. Their unique take on Hawaiian pizza includes a drizzle of local honey for added sweetness and complexity.

pizzerias.name: Dziki Lokator
pizzerias.specialty: Dzika Hawajska (sos pomidorowy, mozzarella, wędzona szynka, ananas, jalapeno)
pizzerias.description: Hip, alternative pizzeria with a creative menu. Their 'Wild Hawaiian' features smoked ham and jalapeños for a spicy twist on the classic combination.

pizzerias.name: Pizzeria Italiana
pizzerias.specialty: Hawaii Speciale (sos pomidorowy, mozzarella di bufala, prosciutto cotto, świeży ananas, bazylia)
pizzerias.description: Upscale Italian restaurant serving authentic Neapolitan pizzas. Their premium Hawaiian pizza uses buffalo mozzarella and high-quality Italian cooked ham.

pizzerias.name: Pizzatopia
pizzerias.specialty: Ananas Supreme (sos pomidorowy, mozzarella, karmelizowany ananas, włoska szynka, jalapeño)
pizzerias.description: Modern pizzeria with a build-your-own concept. Their signature Hawaiian pizza features caramelized pineapple and jalapeños for a sweet and spicy combination.

pizzerias.name: Dominium Pizza
pizzerias.specialty: Pizza Hawaii (sos pomidorowy, podwójny ser, szynka, ananas)
pizzerias.description: Popular Polish pizza chain with multiple locations throughout Warsaw. Their Hawaiian pizza includes double cheese and is available in multiple sizes.

pizzerias.name: Cuda na Kiju
pizzerias.specialty: Hawajska Rzemieślnicza (sos pomidorowy, mozzarella, grillowany ananas, szynka dojrzewająca, chili)
pizzerias.description: Craft beer bar serving artisanal pizzas with creative toppings. Their Hawaiian pizza features grilled pineapple and aged ham with a touch of chili.

pizzerias.name: Warszawska Pyza i Pizza
pizzerias.specialty: Hawajska po Warszawsku (sos pomidorowy, ser gouda, szynka, ananas, kukurydza, szczypiorek)
pizzerias.description: Traditional Polish restaurant serving both local specialties and pizzas. Their 'Warsaw-style' Hawaiian pizza uses gouda instead of mozzarella and adds corn and chives.

disclaimer: Information may have changed since the last update. Please check with the establishments directly for the most current menu offerings and details.
